'''1.20.72''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on March 19–22, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/25142927462925|title=Minecraft - 1.20.72 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 19, 2024}}</ref> which fixes some gameplay crashes.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
